Module com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu
Package com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu.Player
public class Player extends Object
The representation of the Player. It has a Client, useful to differentiate one player from another. The clientCallback is useful for the server execute functions on the client-side.
